store package

Submodules

store.urls module

store.urls.app_name = 'store'

App name. Used for easy referencing in templates.

store.urls.urlpatterns = [<URLPattern '' [name='store_page']>]

URL for the store page. Only one path is needed.

store.views module

store.views.store_page(request)[source]

Renders the store page.

Parameters:

  • request – The request object.

  • template_name – The name of the template to render.

Returns:

The rendered store page template.
